name: The Compact Mat
description:
At 12MM thick, The Compact Mat is designed for comfort and convenience. This capsule-shaped mat effortlessly transforms into a block, offering extra support when and where you need it most. Or unfold to reveal a moisture-wicking, non-slip surface ideal for any and every movement.
Lightweight and travel-friendly, The Compact Mat is a must-have whether you’re WFH, in studio or on-the-go.   
The Compact Mat is FINAL SALE and not eligible for refunds or exchanges.

name: The Play Mat
description:
The perfect mat for your busy life. The Play Mat is built for comfort and speed, whether at home or on-the-go. The first-of-its-kind portal shape is a true showstopper. Its antimicrobial, waterproof top layer is moisture-wicking and nonslip.
Floor it. 
Patent Pending
***Final Sale***

name: The Wavy Mat
description:
At 5MM thick, The Wavy Mat will awaken your senses and elevate your practice. The never-before-seen mat shape will uplevel your space. Its antimicrobial, waterproof top layer is moisture-wicking and nonslip.
Wave your old mat goodbye. 
Patent Pending

name: The Deco Mat
description:
At 5MM thick, The Deco Mat will transform your space and your life. Designed to fit seamlessly in your home or stand out in your studio. Its antimicrobial, waterproof top layer is moisture-wicking and nonslip.
Slay. 

***Final Sale***

name: The Mat Scrunchie
description:
The Mat Scrunchie, the first and only scrunchie that keeps your mat neatly rolled and looking really, really cute. 
Oh yes, we did.

name: The Play Mat Towel
description:
Round out your practice with The Play Mat Towel, designed to take on your sweatiest of practices. Made in an absorbent fabric with a gripped underside to prevent slipping, it’s perfect for yoga, pilates, and heated room exercises.
After all, good things come to those who sweat.

name: The Capsule Mat Towel
description:
The Capsule Mat Towel is designed to work as hard as you do. Made from a soft, absorbent fabric with silicone nubs to prevent slipping, The Capsule Mat Towel is ideal for yoga, pilates, and heated sessions. 
Get ready to get sweaty!
